name: teruxa
description: Teruxa UGC Ops - Create, localize, and optimize UGC ad creatives

scripts.build: npm run build -w @ugc/backend && npm run build -w @ugc/frontend
scripts.build:all: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:backend && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:verify: npm run typecheck:all && npm run lint:all && npm run build:all
scripts.test:e2e: npm run db:generate -w @ugc/backend && npm run test:e2e -w @ugc/frontend
scripts.test:e2e:ui: npm run db:generate -w @ugc/backend && npm run test:e2e:ui -w @ugc/frontend
scripts.test:smoke: npm run db:generate -w @ugc/backend && npm run test:smoke -w @ugc/frontend
scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.ci:release: npm run build:verify && npm run test:smoke && npm run test:e2e
